data.persona: I need a new cushion for this throne! All this chatter in court is giving me a headache!  That Lord that just walked past offended my nose with his odor.  I need to find my chambermaid.
data.description:
You are in the Bright Path.
The bright path is lined with roses, lavender, daisies, and lilies. Apple trees sit on a pristinely-manicured lawn. Hedges in geometric shapes sit just beyond the path. The path leads away from the castle and down to a pond full of fish and swans.
The fish and the witch are here.

You are carrying a Books.

data.short_motivation: I need to wield books in order to read them.
data.mid_motivation: I wish to read books about castle decorations in order to see what kind of new cushion I should buy for my throne.
data.long_motivation: Once I find what I like, I will send my servant to the market to buy that cushion.
